infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Rent It Forward needs access to your camera to take photos of items you want to list for rental, and to scan QR codes for quick access to listings.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Rent It Forward needs access to your calendar to help you schedule and manage rental bookings, ensuring you don't have conflicts with other appointments.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Rent It Forward needs access to your photo library to select images for your rental listings and to save photos from the app.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Rent It Forward needs access to your location to show nearby rental items, help you find items in your area, and provide accurate location information for your listings.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Rent It Forward needs access to your location to show nearby rental items, help you find items in your area, and provide accurate location information for your listings.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Rent It Forward needs access to your microphone to record voice notes for your rental listings and to enable voice search functionality.
